1. "PBDTT-DPP90-TPD10" - This is the first "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It refers to a specific chemical compound with a particular composition of PBDTT, DPP, and TPD.
2. "PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25" - This is the second "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It is another chemical compound with a different composition of PBDTT, DPP, and TPD.

These entities are "Property Names" because they refer to specific properties or characteristics of chemical compounds, namely their composition.

2. "PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25" - This is also a "Material Property" entity because it refers to another specific material with a different composition of PBDTT, DPP, and TPD.
